tr.td: Character knows that the religion exists but cannot separate it from other convocations.
Lip service payed to the religion and ability to separate it from other major faiths.
The main tenets are known and followed individually. Sects/heresies are not considered.
Religion is quoted often and other faiths routinely treated unfairly.
Adherent is seeking to further the religion outside of his immediate domain. Distinction between inner-religion minutiae are important.
Heresy is abhorred. Support for the religion takes precedent over other interests.
Adherent is a prophet and accepts serious consequences for following details of his faith. May invent rituals and the like.
